title: R.I.P. Aimons-nous vivants !
overview: Anne-Lise's life is turned upside down when her father leaves her the management of the funeral company he founded upon his death. She who had done everything to get away from the city of her childhood and especially from this morbid business is as if brought back by destiny. While she saw this responsibility as a burden, the single mother will gradually realize that this may be the opportunity for her to solve all her problems! Starting with her unhealthy need to interfere in people's lives. Especially when these people are grieving clients looking to solve their personal problems. To do this, she will be able to count on the help of her loyal and atypical employees and thus prove to the world that there is no wedding without tears and no funeral without laughter!
